mapper.select: select product_number, product_id, product_category_1, product_category_2, product_subject, product_content, product_img_1, product_img_2, product_img_3, product_img_4, product_img_5, product_starting_price, product_bidding_unit, to_char(product_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as product_end_date, product_delivery, product_transaction_area, product_purchase_price, product_re_auction, product_current_price, product_bids, product_participants, product_credit_score, product_views, to_char(product_issue_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as product_issue_date, product_progress from product where product_number = #{product_number}
mapper.update: update product set product_current_price=#{price} where product_number=#{bid_product_number}
update product set product_progress =1 where product_number=#{bid_product_number}
mapper.select: select nvl(product_starting_price,0) from product where product_number=#{bid_product_number}
select nvl(product_purchase_price,0) from product where product_number=#{bid_product_number}

select review_number,review_id,review_evaluator,review_evaluate,review_image,review_subject, review_content,to_char(review_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') as review_date,review_no from review where review_id = #{review_id} and review_no>=#{review_startrow} and review_no<=#{review_endrow} order by review_no desc
select nvl(count(*),0) from review where review_id = #{review_id}
